context.title: Prevent binding to privileged ports
context.description: The ports which are lower than 1024 receive and transmit various sensitive and privileged data. Allowing containers to use them can bring serious implications.
context.remediation: Do not map the container ports to privileged host ports when starting a container.

raw.Title: Prevent binding to privileged ports
raw.Description: The ports which are lower than 1024 receive and transmit various sensitive and privileged data. Allowing containers to use them can bring serious implications.
raw.Message: deployment novasec-ui in novasec namespace should not set spec.template.spec.containers.ports.containerPort to less than 1024
raw.Resolution: Do not map the container ports to privileged host ports when starting a container.
